title: Decades of Lost Potential in Defense Research and Development
description: America’s greatest national security threat is an enemy born from and nurtured by the Pentagon: crippling bureaucracy. It starves the oxygen from good ideas, good people, and good technologies while creating ideal conditions for mediocrity to thrive. It has p…
